name: Small & Furious: Challenge the Crazy Crash Test Dummies in an Endless Race
name_original: Small & Furious: Challenge the Crazy Crash Test Dummies in an Endless Race
description:
FLIP with your car as fast as you can!
NITRO your way through checkpoints in endless mode!
JUMP from ramps and get rewards for your stunts!

‣‣ Physics-based acrobatics stunt race game with RC cars - lots of stunts, each with their own rewards!
‣‣ 4 different environments with amazingly vivid, colorful HD 3D graphics
‣‣ 81 uniquely designed challenge tracks for small acrobatics RC cars
‣‣ Explore unique, procedural endless modes in many worlds with your small crash dummy
‣‣ Special gameplay elements: brutal nitro, jumpers, boosters, blockers, acrobatics, stunts
‣‣ 18 small characters with unique voiceover and animated acrobatics
‣‣ 8 cars, each with unique physics and RC acrobatics stunt race handling

Grab your helmet and join the acrobatics stunt race - or just forget about your helmet altogether and crash!


Universal game with HD graphics.
